text_block_list.text: As I was walking along the training course, I noticed Vodka facing another horsegirl.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: If she's the same as me, then she's not above or below me. She's fair and square. No handicap, Senpai!!

text_block_list.name: Classmate Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Vodka's challenging Senpai…… I wonder what'll happen……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: All right, the final corner. Let's fight! The final corner! Get out of the way!!
Well done chasing her down, but…… In the end, Vodka was defeated by a two-ba difference.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: *sigh* I lost today. But…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I won't lose next time! I'll turn them all into trees and beat them to it! I'll be the strongest horsegirl in the future!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: (Heh, it's decided……! No one can stop me from running even if I lose.)

text_block_list.name: Senior Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes. You're so cute when you're so stiff. Good luck next time. Bye.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Oooh! Wait, huh? Doesn't she seem really scared? Do you understand my hidden power? Hey!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, Trainer, I need to talk to you about something. You saw my match, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ”I won't lose next time!” I was trying to sound cool, but…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Now that I think about it, isn't that actually kinda cool!? Senpai was looking at me warmly.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Thinking about it calmly… It sounds like the line of a bad guy who got hurt. Like, 'Remember this next time!'

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: That's not true! It wasn't like this before I enrolled. I never lost. But…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Trecen Academy has amazing people, so sometimes you lose. When you lose, your heart screams in disappointment.
choice_data_list: What if I don't tell you?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I see. If I lose, I'll try not to talk too much…… Okay, let's practice.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ah, ahhh, Testaments… Let's go. 『Ha, I lost today. I admit it. See you.』

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: ………………But I'll be the next to win! I'll beat you!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Sorry. I'm going. I'm starting to feel pathetic…
I hurriedly chased after Vodka, who was walking away.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for making you worry, Trainer. I feel like I'm losing my cool.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm going to challenge any strong opponent head-on. That's fine, but I don't know if it's cool or not.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I can't get it out of my mouth! It's because of my dad's influence. Like, 'You don't have a heart,' or 'You're second.'

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I've always been taught how cool that is.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: But, at this rate, it's kinda lame. I don't want to be a talker. That's why I'm a trainer!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: You're the only one who understands how cool I am.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: If that's the case, then you can extend me even further, right?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Thank you! If you say so, I'll be a hundred strong! One day, I'll be even cooler than I am! A-And then…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: And while you're at it, help me crush my weak spot. Umm… When I see lovestruck, I feel a shiver run down my spine.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Idiot, it's not embarrassing! Don't get the wrong idea. …Don't say this. If you tell anyone, I'll kick you!
Vodka leaves, her shoulders furious. For some reason, her neck is bright red.
